QuestData.Title: Archon Save Us
QuestData.Description:
Most of the aspirants were slaughtered and dismembered on arrival. They were the lucky ones.
The lead surgeon decided that the only things worth taking from me... were my eyes. I was discarded afterward and left to my rot. Archon save me, the screaming...
I think there are other survivors being held nearby. Can you aid me in freeing them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Save the souls in the Holding Pens.
QuestData.RewardText:
Only four survivors... I know I should be grateful that there were any at all, but...
What sort of monsters would do this to anyone, let alone to their own people?
